content: Noah Lev has marked this topic as resolved.

@Nick12 Yeah, I think that's from the change to make rustfmt a subtree. I ran into those errors a few months ago and IIRC fixed them by removing src/tools/rustfmt and then running git checkout src/tools/rustfmt or something like that.
Yeah I fixed it already, git reset --hard origin/master did the trick for me. Thanks!
